pages.title: Daybreak Town
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: Forest, Plains, Savanna, Swamp$(br2)Includes 2 $(l:zero_one/mobs/trilobite_magia)Trilobite Magia$(/l) spawners$(br2)Includes a $(l:misc/blocks/boss_blocks#horobi_boss_block)Horobi Boss Block$(/l)$(br2)Includes a $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#zaia_3d_printer)ZAIA 3D Printer$(/l)
